name: Universe
description: An application made to gather all ESN information.

scripts.package-windows: electron-packager . Universe --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --prune=true --icon=assets/img/icons/logo.ico --appCopyright="G33k Team - ESN France - All rights reserved" --overwrite
scripts.package-mac: electron-packager . Universe --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --prune=true --icon=assets/img/icons/logo.icns --appCopyright="G33k Team - ESN France - All rights reserved" --overwrite
scripts.package-linux: electron-packager . Universe --platform=linux --arch=ia32 --prune=true --appCopyright="G33k Team - ESN France - All rights reserved" --overwrite
scripts.create-mac-installer: npm run package-mac && electron-installer-dmg Universe-darwin-x64 Universe --out=./ --icon=assets/img/icons/logo.icns --background=assets/img/icons/logo.icns --overwrite

author: G33k Team - ESN France
